item.title: About me
item.description: Projects In addition to my studies, I do a lot of open source project development in my spare time. Currently, I am an active developer of Cutie Shell Project and I am also a team member of Droidian GNU/Linux. You can watch me presenting Droidian on a live stream linked below. I have also contributed to GNOME Music Player You can also find me on Twitter and on GitHub.
item.content:
Projects

In addition to my studies, I do a lot of open source project development in my spare time.

Currently, I am an active developer of Cutie Shell Project and I am also a team member of Droidian GNU/Linux. You can watch me presenting Droidian on a live stream linked below.

I have also contributed to GNOME Music Player

You can also find me on Twitter and on GitHub.
